Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Suspend 3–{2}{B} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{B} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Whenever a time counter is removed from Bell of Avici while it’s exiled, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
